programme.title: Space Channel - Cinespace Music
programme.desc: Space and music go so well together.....these Cinespace movies prove our point. Duration: 1800

programme.title: Space Channel Shorts
programme.desc: In Cradle, Eade and her dad are on the return journey to earth when an explosion cripples the craft and seriously injures her father. In New Mars, a generation lives underground on Mars preparing to begin a new life as the colonists of a planet which is being terraformed into a new habitable world. Finally, Kaya Torres is circling a black hole in a pod. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Movies- Its a dangerous universe!
programme.desc: The Boogies, SkyFighter and Caronte show that space is a dangerous place. Especially when it lands on the ground. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: The Day The Earth Stood Still
programme.desc: An Alien lands in Washington D.C. and has a warninf for all mankind. The people of Earth must live peacefully or be destroyed as a danger to other planets. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Universe- all around our social space.
programme.desc: Join us alongside Sabree Edwards for a trip around the Space Channel Universe, bringing you News, Movies, Music, Original Series & so much more! Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Dealers : The Apollo Sale
programme.desc: Torie’s son Jason joins her on the road – she’s introducing him to the family business but will he be more hindrance than help? Larry turns ‘gastronaut’ when he comes across some space food; and a collector’s flash sale sees Cole bid for an Apollo 11 item with an incredible story – how Buzz Aldrin took Holy Communion on the moon. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Dealers : Good Luck, Bad Luck
programme.desc: Cole gets lucky when he finds a Russian space suit in an old box. But there’s a problem – the gloves are missing. To find the gloves he has to strike a deal with Larry which sees them take a trip through the desert. Meanwhile Torie hears how Coke and Pepsi joined the space race; and she meets former NASA astronaut Winston Scott who tells her about the struggles of keeping clean in zero-G. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Music
programme.desc: A musical and visual celebration of our connection with our home planet and the universe. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Astronaut: The Last Push
programme.desc: A tragic accident cuts short the first manned mission to explore life on the moons of Jupiter. Michael Forrest must make the 3 year journey home to Earth in pure solitude. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Invaders from Mars

programme.title: Planets with David Becker
programme.desc: For more than three decades, Grammy and Emmy nominated guitarist, composer, producer David Becker has continued to define himself as one of the best and most unique voices in jazz and contemporary music by combining diverse influences and a passion for the new and different, and his ability to play for the present while always keeping an eye on the past and future. He has led the critically acclaimed DAVID BECKER TRIBUNE to a worldwide audience by performing in more than 35 countries. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Santa Clause Conquers the Martians
programme.desc: Santa has been kidnapped, by Martians! Saint Nick has been taken to bring Christmas cheer to the children of Mars, but some saboteurs have other plans. Duration: 5400

programme.title: Space Channel News Starbase Update...and more
programme.desc: Space Channel News with continuing coverage of the SpaceX Starship program. Duration: 1800

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: I Married a Monster from Outer Space
programme.desc: Aliens arrive on Earth to possess the bodies of humans. One of their first victims is a young man, whose new wife soon realizes something is wrong with him. Duration: 5400

programme.title: Space Channel Music
programme.desc: visual and music connection to the universe. Duration: 1800

programme.title: SpacedOut! with Sarah Begum
programme.desc: Sarah sits down with Master Sri Akarshawna to discuss Astral Travel. Explained as an intentional out-of-body experience that assumes the existence of a soul called an "astral body" that is separate from the physical body and capable of traveling outside it throughout the universe. Whatever your thoughts on this, it's a fascinating conversation! Duration: 5400

programme.desc: Commander Kit Draper is forced to crash-land on Mars when his mission goes horribly wrong. He must figure out how to find oxygen, water, and food on the lifeless planet. Duration: 9000
